title: Introducing the One Minute Czech Podcast
itunes:title: Introducing the One Minute Czech Podcast
description:
Coming soon: learn Czech in minutes with One Minute Czech. Join the Coffee Break team for an espresso shot of Czech.

Episodes are released weekly and this series features a total of ten lessons. If you'd like to learn faster, use our video versions and lesson booklet, available on the Coffee Break Academy.

One Minute Czech is a production of the Coffee Break Academy for Radio Lingua Ltd.
